title: Black screen on character select
body: So this started happening 2 weeks ago first I unistalled and reinstalled it worked fine at first then it started doing this black screen at the character select I've tried everything to fix it and it just won't work can someone help me

replies.body:
Blacks screens inside the client are an indication that the client is having a hard time reaching a specific set of servers. I strongly recommend checking out our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some common solutions for this.

Let me know if those steps resolve this for you.
None of these worked for me.

In that case, we'll need to take a closer look at your system logs to determine what's causing this. I recommend running a set of logs using our [Hextech Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) request.

If you have any questions about this, let me know.
Thank you I used the Hextech Tool and it fixed my issue!!!
